title: Calculate incidence of per-unit tax from graph

content.description: Assume that the government imposes a <math alttext="$4" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>$</mi> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> per-unit tax on sellers of a good in the market described by the graph above.
content.question: What are the price paid by buyers, the after-tax price received by sellers, and the deadweight loss?

choices.label: Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$100" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$200" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$100" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$200" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Price Paid by BuyersPrice Received by SellersDeadweight Loss<math alttext="$8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$200" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
